name: Catch the Mouse Cat Game for iPhone
name_original: Catch the Mouse Cat Game for iPhone
description:
This is a very simple little Catch the Mouse game for your cat. It will keep track of how many times your cat catches the mouse. You can select background (there are 7 different backgrounds to choose from) and you can reset the counter. That's all! It's so simple that your cat can play all by itself without any help or instructions from you : )

This game is designed for both iPhone and iPad. The iPhone has a very small screen for this kind of cat game and frankly, my cats only want to play with it on my iPad, but several cats have asked to have an iPhone version, so here it is!
